title: wedding invite font
content:
Hi,

My cousins wedding invite needs some tweaking and he needs the same font that was used here, anyone know what the font is? It would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717130728im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_4399.jpg)
author: qqusai

comments.content:
Not sure which version, but looks like Peignot.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/peignot/demi/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717130728/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/peignot/demi/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/peignot/demi/")
